name: Winchester
description:
Winchester is a short 3D Horror-Adventure game. See the trailer here!

Annabelle is on her way home to San Francisco when she crashes her car. Her injuries lead her to the house, and the history of all that has happened within. Mrs. Hannover lives here, and has forced her help onto Annabelle. The house is off-putting and soon reveals its secret history to Annabelle, who becomes increasingly desperate to escape.

Made with Unity, this game features:

*Real-time physics

*Immersive, adventure horror

*Unique 3D pixel art

*AI that doesn't always know where you are, but seek you out when they can

If you enjoy it, donate or rate it for the Pixel Horror Game Jam 2016!

Tumblr: http://winchestergame.tumblr.com/

Twitter: @rubikscubetb

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/laughingnarwhalgames

Bug Log:

11/2/2016: Thanks Puato for pointing out the clock hands issue! V5 has been uploaded. Data should be saved from version to version so feel free to update and continue playing! As always, any issues, let me know!
